entities.label: UNMIK Bank Account Investigation Final Report
United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo (UNMIK)

edges.label: 1. Contract Signed
edges.tooltip: UNMIK and Air BP signed a contract for aviation fuel and refueling services on 2001-07-13.

edges.label: 2. Account Opened
edges.tooltip: UNMIK opened a bank account in Pristina on 2001-10-11.

edges.label: 3. Payment Made
edges.tooltip: First payment to the UNMIK Bank Account via International Money Transfer on 2002-04-17.

edges.label: 4. Forensic Audit
edges.tooltip: Forensic audit report by Chartered Accountants highlighted alleged irregularities in February 2003.

edges.label: 5. Contract Amendment
edges.tooltip: Contract amendment to supply additional aviation fuel and refueling services on 2004-03-03.

edges.label: 6. Investigation Subject
edges.tooltip: The UNMIK Bank Account was the subject of the investigation for alleged mismanagement of funds.

UNMIK Bank Account: Irregular ownership and management of funds originating from Pristina Airport.
Disputed legal ownership of funds affecting airport operations.
